Filter transactions with valid date rang.description: The user wants to see the transactions within a valid date range.
input: click on 'View All Transactions' button or double click on a specific bank account from the Account List view
select a start date which is before at least one transaction.
select an end date or keep it blank if the desired date is the current date.
output: The displayed transactions are withing the date range selected.

Select an invalid date range.description: The user sets an invalid date range.
input: click on 'View All Transactions' button or double click on a specific bank account from the Account List view
select a start date which is after any transaction.
output: The list of transactions is empty.
